title: MiniTool Partition Wizard Techician edition 10.2.2
description:
MiniTool Partition Wizard is really a professional partition manager that is developed aiming at Home windows PC. It owns comprehensive partition management functions, like Merge Partition, Move/Resize Partition, Copy Partition, Create Partition, Split Partition, Delete Partition, Format Partition, and Convert File System.

MiniTool Partition Wizard Techician edition 10.2.2
Partition Management
Can meet users’ calls for partition management completely :
Extend partition: increase partition capacity with no damage to data.
Merge 2 neighboring partitions without getting any harm to data.
Interconvert disk between the dynamic disk and fundamental disk and interconvert file system between FAT and NTFS perfectly.
Set partition label: users can also add an annotation for partition based on actual needs.
Help users convert MBR disk to GPT disk in order to make smarter utilization of disk space.
Help users look into the completeness of file system anytime. Once problem emerges, it can benefit repair it.
Help change partition cluster size without applying any affect on data.
Copy Wizard
Help users complete disk copy and partition copy :
Copy partition in addition to data stored in the partition rapidly in order to safeguard data.
Copy the entire disk to non-system disk in order to avoid reinstalling the operating system.
Copy dynamic volume to fundamental disk securely.
Partition Recovery

Help users recover lost partition rapidly :
Recover partition that is lost because of personal mistake, software error, virus attack, along with other factors.
Support recovering partitions with different types of file systems like FAT and NTFS.
Dynamic Disk

MiniTool Partition Wizard Server Edition supports operating dynamic disk.
Might help users create volume and move volume.
Help users explore detailed qualities of the volume.
Help format volume
